name: ServerRoom
0:
”Alexa open Server Room”
”Alexa ask Server Room to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: server room
des:
Step into the cool, technology-filled ambiance of a server room. This skill replicates the sound of servers humming and air conditioning units working overtime to keep everything at the optimal temperature. It's perfect for tech enthusiasts or anyone who finds the steady sound of hardware operation comforting.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Server Room
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
